choices.label: C
choices.text: Pumping your brakes rapidly is the best technique on all icy roads

choices.label: D
choices.text: Drive at normal speed to avoid getting stuck in the ice

explanation: According to the Kentucky Driver's Manual on page 14, Reduce speed, increase following distance, and avoid sudden movements with steering, braking, or acceleration.
